['', '\xa0• Post-graduate or Ph.D. in Computer Science or Machine Learning related degree with a focus on NLP; \xa0', '• Bachelors degree in data science, math, computer science, statistics or related field ', '• Working closely with consumer teams to build solutions that deliver impactful projects', '• Strong interest in work involving data pipelines and/or large-scale data processing \xa0\xa0', '• Deploy your algorithms as production services', 'We’re seeking to grow a team of brilliant and diverse contributors with natural language processing (NLP) expertise to build systems that read proprietary and public text datasets, extract key information to be input as features for statistical models. This is a chance to get into a cutting edge company on the ground floor with opportunities for leadership level growth, equity and founding status. Lead Data Scientist – NLP role is a hands-on position where you will be empowered to be creative, ambitious and bold, to solve novel R&D problems that haven’t been solved yet. This is an exciting role that will stretch your knowledge and curiosity, offering the opportunity to learn new skills.', '• Solid understanding of statistics and math behind deep learning ', 'Qualifications:', '• Good theoretical grounding in core machine learning concepts and techniques ', '• English language native speaker: \xa0', '• Experience with applying NLP models to live production systems ', '\xa0• Researching, experimenting, prototyping and building models and components for content understanding pipelines, including state of art neural architectures for domain model selection, pre-training, fine-tuning, optimization, etc. ', '• Experience with data analysis tools ', '• 2+ years of ML application and applied natural language processing ', '• Developing, transforming and reinforcing the quality datasets needed for specific natural language processing tasks \xa0', '• Expert level programming skills Python ', 'Your duties will include: ', '• Publications in related domain ', '• Development of own deep learning architectures ', '• Backend development experience', '• Experience with a number of ML techniques and frameworks, e.g., data discretization, normalization, sampling, linear regression, decision trees, SVMs, deep neural networks, etc. ', '• Linux user experience ', '• Experience building machine learning models', 'Nice to have:', '• Identify opportunities to apply the latest advancements in NLP and Machine Learning to build, test, and validate models in named entity recognition, relation extraction, and entity linking ', 'Phylum is a data science software company offering consulting and turnkey solutions on our proprietary platform, DataEngine. DataEngine provides advanced analytics and data aggregation tools to help companies identify market gaps, predict and uncover insights into consumer experience. \xa0\xa0', '• Ability to perform comprehensive literature reviews and provide critical feedback on state-of-the-art solutions and how they may fit different operating constraints ', '• Experience with software engineering practices (e.g. unit testing, code reviews, design documentation) \xa0']

job_title: Enterprise Data Scientist – Permanent Full Time Opportunity
job_text: ['', 'Identify, search, and analyze patterns in data in order to find opportunities working alongside our Product Development, Process Management, or Engineering teams.', 'Familiar with a variety of technologies including: Object oriented programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, etc., Scripting languages such as R, SAS, Spark, Relational languages such as SQL, RDF, SPARQL, and Data formats including XML, JSON, CSV, Graphs, etc.', 'Have experience with Machine learning for supervised learning and applying time series forecasting.', 'Partner directly with business stakeholders from across the company to analyze problems and implement solutions.', 'Create detailed documentation of developed solution approaches for others to re-create including documentation formats such as internal wiki articles, product design specifications, cast studies, industry whitepapers, patent documents, publications, etc.\xa0', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of industry experience in a related role and an advanced degree in a related field or a minimum of 4-5 years of industry experience in a related role and an undergraduate degree in a related field.Familiar with a variety of technologies including: Object oriented programming languages such as Python, Scala, Java, C++, JavaScript, etc., Scripting languages such as R, SAS, Spark, Relational languages such as SQL, RDF, SPARQL, and Data formats including XML, JSON, CSV, Graphs, etc.Have experience with Machine learning for supervised learning and applying time series forecasting.Experience within the marketing, advertising, media, or related industry a plus, not required.', 'Location – Hunt Valley, MD (fully remote currently, partial remote work flexible long term) ', 'Due to rapid company growth and recent acquisitions, his is a newly created Senior Enterprise Data Scientist opportunity within a publicly traded industry leading organization which was just ranked as one of the top employers to work in its market. Serving as an innovative and practical problem solver, the Senior Enterprise Data Scientist will join a growing team and will offer the unique ability to function as a thought leader and work directly across a variety of disciplines including: Data Science, User Experience Research, Data Visualization, Business Analysis, and Software Development. This is a full-time permanent opportunity offering a competitive compensation package including a base range of $135,000 to $150,000, excellent benefits, career mobility, and the ability to join a company culture dedicated to being an industry leader in data management innovation.\xa0', 'Enterprise Data Scientist (Permanent Full Time) ', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Requirements\xa0', 'Utilize capabilities of querying and analyzing data using a holistic perspective', 'Extract meaningful statistics and other data characteristics using time series forecasting as well as a variety of approaches including statistical analysis, analysis of variance and correlational designs, machine learning for supervised learning, mathematical optimization for systems of equations, simulation using sampling techniques.', 'Partner directly with business stakeholders from across the company to analyze problems and implement solutions.Work with data across the complete analytical life cycle to build hypothetical models containing key assumptions, create mock-ups, prototype approaches, and implement production solutions.Identify, search, and analyze patterns in data in order to find opportunities working alongside our Product Development, Process Management, or Engineering teams.Specialize in one or more areas of advanced research and continually stay informed on new research relevant to the business.\xa0Utilize exceptional communication skills to be able to articulate the benefits of a proposed solution to internal and external stakeholders.\xa0Create detailed documentation of developed solution approaches for others to re-create including documentation formats such as internal wiki articles, product design specifications, cast studies, industry whitepapers, patent documents, publications, etc.\xa0Utilize capabilities of querying and analyzing data using a holistic perspectiveExtract meaningful statistics and other data characteristics using time series forecasting as well as a variety of approaches including statistical analysis, analysis of variance and correlational designs, machine learning for supervised learning, mathematical optimization for systems of equations, simulation using sampling techniques.', 'Experience within the marketing, advertising, media, or related industry a plus, not required.', 'Minimum of 2-3 years of industry experience in a related role and an advanced degree in a related field or a minimum of 4-5 years of industry experience in a related role and an undergraduate degree in a related field.', 'Enterprise Data Scientist – Job Description ', 'Work with data across the complete analytical life cycle to build hypothetical models containing key assumptions, create mock-ups, prototype approaches, and implement production solutions.', 'Utilize exceptional communication skills to be able to articulate the benefits of a proposed solution to internal and external stakeholders.\xa0', 'Specialize in one or more areas of advanced research and continually stay informed on new research relevant to the business.\xa0']

Develops and maintains good working relationships with other MedStar associates and ensures excellent two-way communication with all appropriate audiences: Coworkers, departmental management, MedStar Management and other customers. Makes suggestions for improvements to processes, outcomes and behaviors to achieve departmental and MedStar goals. Participates in multidisciplinary quality and service improvement teams as appropriate. Participates in meetings, serves on committees and represents the department and hospital/facility in community outreach efforts as appropriate. Performs other duties as assigned. Presents data to management with simplicity of design in a clear, easy to understand format. Complex ideas are communicated with clarity, precision, and efficiency in a manner that ensures accurate comprehension by the recipient. Tools: Builds and maintains accurate, effective databases as required by individual projects. Ensures and validates reliability of input data. Demonstrates proficiency with data mining and manipulation tools including Excel and Access. Under the direction of the Risk and Insurance Manager, prepared weekly, monthly, quarterly and bi-annual reports in support of business operations and quality improvement/patient safety initiatives, primarily related to the professional liability claims program, but also in support of other initiatives within the Risk Management Department. Reports are distributed to many within MedStar, including hospital presidents, VPMAs, Risk Managers, the GFIL Board, the Audit and Compliance Committee of the MedStar Board. Reports include tabular, graphical, and written analysis formats.  ', 'Participates in multidisciplinary quality and service improvement teams as appropriate. Participates in meetings, serves on committees and represents the department and hospital/facility in community outreach efforts as appropriate.', 'Knowledge, Skills & Abilities', 'Assists Risk and Insurance Manager with physician/hospital PL insurance coverage for GFIL program. Includes assistance with database management of physician coverage, physician underwriting and review of contracts to verify coverage. Also includes working with VP of Risk Management, our actuary and finance department to develop GFIL PL budget and allocation of premium throughout system. Ensures and validates reliability of input data.']

job_title: Data Scientist II - RI Solutions & Innovations
job_text: ['', 'Data Scientist II - RI Solution & Innovations', 'Work both independently and in small teams to develop data analytic solutions', 'May mentor junior data scientists and may occasionally provide work direction and/or supervise staff such as subordinates, contractors, vendors, students, etc.', 'Standing/walking - Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Typing on a keyboard Frequently (34-66%)Talking on phone/in person Occasionally (0-33%)Able to lift up to 50 lbs. Occasionally (0-33%)Standing/walking - Occasionally (0-33%)', '\xa0', 'To fulfill this role successfully, you must possess these minimum qualifications and experience:', 'What Are We Looking For?', 'Participate in requirement gathering, planning, technical design, and implementation for data science projectsProvide level of effort and schedule estimates to help with project planning Serve as project owner/manager for one or more data science projectsServe as a local expert in one or more technical areas related to data analyticsWork both independently and in small teams to develop data analytic solutionsMay mentor junior data scientists and may occasionally provide work direction and/or supervise staff such as subordinates, contractors, vendors, students, etc.Work with both clinical and research data while keeping PHI exposure to a need-only basisAdhere to and contribute to the development of best practices for statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, data mining, and big data management and analytics', 'Candidates must possess a PhD degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Clinical Informatics, Engineering or a related discipline, or a Master’s degree with 5+ years of experience1+ years of data manipulation and analysis experience using R, SAS, SQL, noSQL, Python or Java etc; more experience is a plus1+ years of data analytics experience in one or more of the following areas: statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and geospatial analytics; more experience is a plus', 'Participate in requirement gathering, planning, technical design, and implementation for data science projects', 'Typing on a keyboard Frequently (34-66%)', '1+ years of data analytics experience in one or more of the following areas: statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing (NLP), and geospatial analytics; more experience is a plus', 'Talking on phone/in person Occasionally (0-33%)', '1+ years of data manipulation and analysis experience using R, SAS, SQL, noSQL, Python or Java etc; more experience is a plus', 'Candidates must possess a PhD degree in Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics, Clinical Informatics, Engineering or a related discipline, or a Master’s degree with 5+ years of experience', 'Provide level of effort and schedule estimates to help with project planning', 'Minimum Physical Requirements:', 'Able to lift up to 50 lbs. Occasionally (0-33%)', 'Serve as a local expert in one or more technical areas related to data analytics', ' Serve as project owner/manager for one or more data science projects', 'We are seeking a Data Scientist II - The Data Scientist II is responsible for being a catalyst for evidence-based decision-making and a contributor to the advancement of NCH as a data-driven enterprise. Ideal candidates should enjoy flexing their data analytics muscles to solve intriguing clinical or research problems that may directly or indirectly impact clinical care and business operations at NCH. The Data Scientist will contribute to the implementation of a cohesive, powerful, and actionable long-term Data Science strategy involving the analysis of large complex healthcare data sets to discover hidden patterns, trends, and associations in support of research, operational, and clinical objectives. The Data Scientist will partner and consult with NCH stakeholders to identify opportunities to apply advanced analytic solutions, understand requirements, translate requirements to analytical problems, and provide effective data analytic solutions. The candidate should be able to leverage both structured and unstructured data sets to create analytical solutions using tools and/or methods in at least one of the following areas: statistical and predictive modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, and geospatial analysis.', 'EOE/M/F/Disability/Vet', 'We are seeking a Data Scientist II -', 'What Will You Be Doing?', 'Adhere to and contribute to the development of best practices for statistical modeling, machine learning, natural language processing, information retrieval, data mining, and big data management and analytics', 'Work with both clinical and research data while keeping PHI exposure to a need-only basis']

Experience with Django 2.0, Angular2+, REST, Docker, Postgres, Galaxy, AWS, Linux/Unix systems and bash scripting. Direct experience with Illumina sequencing platforms (MiSeq in particular). Experience with RNA-Seq is a huge plus. ['', 'Collaborate with other Ball team members and assist in development of experimental designs to guarantee high quality scientific results.', 'Experience using cloud computing platforms (Microsoft Azure or AWS) is a plus.', ' Minimum of MS degree with 5+ years’ post masters experience; PhD with a minimum 2 years of post-doc experience in plant genomics and bioinformatics.Understanding of key concepts in quantitative genetics is required.4+ years’ experience in data analysis, data management or data warehousing in an industry setting is also required.Experience in Python and R (statistics, bioinformatics, data visualization) is a must have.Experience in genomics (e.g., high throughput sequencing) assisted breeding of ornamental crops is highly desired.2+ years’ experience designing and querying relational databases is preferred.Experience using cloud computing platforms (Microsoft Azure or AWS) is a plus.Experience working with software containerization (Docker, Singularity, Kubernetes) is strongly desired.Possesses essential interpersonal skills to be an effective, collaborative team member.', 'Develop bioinformatics pipeline(s), statistical analysis, data modeling, and internal research software.', '4+ years’ experience in data analysis, data management or data warehousing in an industry setting is also required.', 'The bioinformatics and data sciences lead will be responsible to drive internal genomics and bioinformatics initiatives for Ball Helix, and to provide support to all business units of Ball Horticultural Company. In addition, the selected candidate will lead in employee training, technical support, presenting at meetings, and support of research projects. ', '\xa0', 'Leads priority projects to ensure timely delivery of expected project outputs.', 'Budgets:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0This position may have budgetary responsibility', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Essential Functions', ' In addition to this we provide a comprehensive Total Rewards package that includes: ', '§\xa0An onsite subsidized café overlooking 30 acres of renowned display gardens and\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Ball is a global leader in horticulture: we develop, produce, and sell plants around the world. Our vision is to color the world through our customers. We create excitement in the world of flowers and are the first choice for service. We deliver all the best and nothing else! To you, we deliver a work environment and a culture where building long-lasting relationships internally and externally is important. We believe that good communication, sharing ideas and collaborating on projects will set us up for success. We keep both our feet on the ground and are approachable. ', 'Provides and champions data analysis leadership and data driven initiatives across multi-disciplinary teams throughout Ball.', 'Lead data science strategy as well as staff management to achieve both department and corporate research goals.', 'Lead data science strategy as well as staff management to achieve both department and corporate research goals.Develop bioinformatics pipeline(s), statistical analysis, data modeling, and internal research software.Analyze a wide range of data including high throughput sequencing (e.g. Illumina, PacBio, Oxford Nanopore) and phenotyping data to support internal molecular marker development goals.Secures partnerships and third-party external vendors to access high throughput omics-based technologies.Collaborate with other Ball team members and assist in development of experimental designs to guarantee high quality scientific results.Develops and executes standard operating procedures to ensure consistent and reproducible data analyses.Leads priority projects to ensure timely delivery of expected project outputs.Provides and champions data analysis leadership and data driven initiatives across multi-disciplinary teams throughout Ball.', 'Requirements:', 'Scope of Responsibility', 'Possesses essential interpersonal skills to be an effective, collaborative team member.', 'Staff:\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0This position will have a direct report (Bioinformatics Associate Scientist)', 'Understanding of key concepts in quantitative genetics is required.', 'Secures partnerships and third-party external vendors to access high throughput omics-based technologies.', 'Experience in Python and R (statistics, bioinformatics, data visualization) is a must have.', '§\xa0401k/Profit Sharing Retirement Plan', ' ', '§\xa0Tuition assistance', '§\xa0Medical, dental, life and long-term disability insurance', ' Minimum of MS degree with 5+ years’ post masters experience; PhD with a minimum 2 years of post-doc experience in plant genomics and bioinformatics.', 'Experience in genomics (e.g., high throughput sequencing) assisted breeding of ornamental crops is highly desired.', 'Ball Horticultural Company is the global leader in the breeding, production and distribution of ornamental horticulture products. The Ball research and development team seeks to solve significant problems in breeding, production and product quality, via its global team of breeders and advanced technology R&D platforms. At Ball, we committed to advancing next generation technologies and infrastructure to assure technology and product leadership in the horticultural industry.\xa0', '§\xa0Employee Assistance Program and Positive Health programs', ' \xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0restored natural areas', 'Company Background', 'Develops and executes standard operating procedures to ensure consistent and reproducible data analyses.', 'Analyze a wide range of data including high throughput sequencing (e.g. Illumina, PacBio, Oxford Nanopore) and phenotyping data to support internal molecular marker development goals.', 'Experience working with software containerization (Docker, Singularity, Kubernetes) is strongly desired.', 'Our promise to you:', '§\xa0Paid time off benefits including vacation and holidays', '2+ years’ experience designing and querying relational databases is preferred.']

['', 'Resumes not meeting these requirements will not be considered.', 'Proficient in SQL or similar database access query languages', 'Healthcare Data Analyst (Statistician) Level 1', 'Proficient in SAS statistical programming packageProficient in SQL or similar database access query languagesExperience working with large databasesMinimum of two years professional experience researching and analyzing large blocks of data, interpreting results, and clearly articulating findings.Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to clearly communicate analysis results to non-statistical audiences.', 'The Healthcare Data Analyst Level 1 will work on the maintenance and development of Context 4 Healthcare’s industry-leading Usual, Customary & Reasonable (UCR) claim fee schedule database products. In addition, the Healthcare Data Analyst (Level 1) will work with other staff members to develop and maintain other Context 4 Healthcare products using statistical models created against healthcare data.', 'Model monitoring', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Bachelor’s degree in statistics, math, quantitative economics, industrial engineering, or a similar area.', 'Ad hoc statistical analyses on designated healthcare data', 'Proficient in SAS statistical programming package', 'Analyzing data, building models and assessing their quality', 'The Candidate will be required to work in our Naperville, Illinois office. This is not a remote position.', 'Experience working in the healthcare industry or analyzing healthcare data.', 'Experience working in the healthcare industry or analyzing healthcare data.Knowledge of healthcare claims coding.Bachelor’s degree in statistics, math, quantitative economics, industrial engineering, or a similar area.', 'Responsibilities may include but are not limited to:', 'Context4 Healthcare, Inc. is a world class employer where ingenuity and passion are welcomed. We are a market leader in healthcare claims compliance, reimbursement and regulatory solutions. Context is looking for individuals who want to work for an organization that values excellent employees, workplace diversity, ethical conduct and superior customer service and one that offers challenging opportunities. We value our employees, clients and partners and dedicate our efforts to their success.', 'Candidates must be authorized to work in the United States.\xa0Context 4 Healthcare chooses not to employ persons who require sponsorship for an employment visa, such as an H-1B visa.', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Strong interpersonal skills, with the ability to clearly communicate analysis results to non-statistical audiences.', 'Identifying opportunities to apply statistics to create new products and improve product quality', 'Description: ', 'Knowledge of healthcare claims coding.', 'Minimum of two years professional experience researching and analyzing large blocks of data, interpreting results, and clearly articulating findings.', 'Analyzing data, building models and assessing their qualityModel monitoringAd hoc statistical analyses on designated healthcare dataIdentifying opportunities to apply statistics to create new products and improve product quality', 'Experience working with large databases']

['Strong data and analytic skills, knowledge of excel, numbers and data modeling.', 'Filter and "clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems.', 'Work with management to prioritize business and information needs.', 'Work closely with the Data Anlytics team and cross functionally in marketing to produce monthly & quarterly data driven markeitng reports.', 'Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems.', 'Reporting and presentation skills a must.', 'Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.', 'Duties', 'Looking for a person who has a passion for data and numbers.', 'Knowledge of or experience working on subscription businesses a plus.', 'Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets.', 'Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports.', ' Strong data and analytic skills, knowledge of excel, numbers and data modeling. Knowledge of or experience working on subscription businesses a plus. Reporting and presentation skills a must. Looking for a person who has a passion for data and numbers. The successful candidate will turn data into information and insights that will help support business decisions. Work closely with the Data Anlytics team and cross functionally in marketing to produce monthly & quarterly data driven markeitng reports. Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports. Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality. Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets. Filter and "clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems. Work with management to prioritize business and information needs. Locate and define new process improvement opportunities.', 'The successful candidate will turn data into information and insights that will help support business decisions.', 'Locate and define new process improvement opportunities.']

job_title: Data Science Course Teaching Assistant - San Francisco
job_text: ['', ' You are as passionate about teaching Data Science as about Data Science itself.  You care about writing well commented, modular code and encouraging others to do so!  You are proficient in the curriculum topics of our program (taught in Python), which covers Programming Tools, Data Wrangling, Data Story, Inferential Statistics, Machine Learning, Advanced Data Visualization and Big Data.   You have a flexible schedule that allows you to work a few hours per day, at least 5 days per week  You have experience solving real-life data science problems, and are comfortable working with large data sets.  You are empathetic and have excellent communication skills  Bonus points for experience conducting reviews on through online platforms!', ' Bonus points for experience conducting reviews on through online platforms!', ' You have experience solving real-life data science problems, and are comfortable working with large data sets.', ' You are proficient in the curriculum topics of our program (taught in Python), which covers Programming Tools, Data Wrangling, Data Story, Inferential Statistics, Machine Learning, Advanced Data Visualization and Big Data. ', ' Participants learn about Data Science with the help of a curated online curriculum and a personal mentor. They go through the curriculum at their own pace and have a weekly 30-minute checkin with their mentor to discuss questions, projects, and career advice!', ' More details', ' You are as passionate about teaching Data Science as about Data Science itself.', ' Membership in an rich community of expert mentors from great companies like Apple, Uber and Pandora', 'Requirements', ' Membership in an rich community of expert mentors from great companies like Apple, Uber and Pandora  Change the lives of students in our program and help us revolutionize online education!  Receive a monthly amount per-project honorarium and work at your convenience', ' You have a flexible schedule that allows you to work a few hours per day, at least 5 days per week', " Course TA's provide students with high quality code reviews and support via email and our online community so that students get the help they need even outside of their mentor calls", ' Receive a monthly amount per-project honorarium and work at your convenience', ' Completely online and self-paced. Coursework is ~200 hours and on average, students finish it in 6 months.', 'Benefits', ' Participants in this course are working professionals and college students from all over the world, interested in getting started with data science.', " Completely online and self-paced. Coursework is ~200 hours and on average, students finish it in 6 months.  Participants in this course are working professionals and college students from all over the world, interested in getting started with data science.  Participants learn about Data Science with the help of a curated online curriculum and a personal mentor. They go through the curriculum at their own pace and have a weekly 30-minute checkin with their mentor to discuss questions, projects, and career advice!  Course TA's provide students with high quality code reviews and support via email and our online community so that students get the help they need even outside of their mentor calls The Springboard team of 180 works out of offices in the heart of San Francisco and Bengaluru. We’re backed by top investors, including Costanoa Ventures, Reach Capital, Learn Capital, Pearson Ventures, and the founders of LinkedIn and Princeton Review.Working with us, you’ll enjoy competitive compensation, health insurance coverage (for employees based in California, our base plans are fully covered by Springboard; for employees based outside of California, we offer low-premium coverage), a 401k plan, a generous learning budget, team lunches and snacks, and an opportunity to impact thousands of lives alongside a fun, dedicated and mission-driven team. To learn more about our team and culture, follow us on Instagram !We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We welcome applications from all backgrounds, and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.", ' You are empathetic and have excellent communication skills', ' You care about writing well commented, modular code and encouraging others to do so!', ' Change the lives of students in our program and help us revolutionize online education!']

', 'Qualified candidates will have the following:', 'Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required.', "Bachelor's degree in mathematics or related field and 4-5 years of related experience or equivalent. -Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required. ", '\xa0', 'SQL, MS Azure', 'This well-established company located in New Orleans is seeking to hire an experienced analyst with solid forecasting, statistical/mathematics and Tableau work experience.   The Planning/Forecast Analyst will have the following duties: ', 'This is a direct-hire, not C2C or contract role. Candidates must be US citizens or Permanent Residents and able to permanently relocate to New Orleans in the near future. ', '1. Responsible for completing the design day forecasts, normal volume requirements by month and daily forecast requirements by load study throughout the enterprise. 2. Responsible for comparing actual volumes to forecasted volumes to determine variance and further analyze variance by each component (ie resulting from weather difference, number of customers etc.) annually for peak/design day and monthly forecasts. 3. Responsible for modifying forecasts as necessary and communicating those revisions to appropriate personnel to be utilized in revising supply purchase and storage plans. 4. Provides each business division regulatory support including processing data requests preparing testimony and testifying before state commissions. 5. Evaluates transportation and storage capacity to ensure ability to meet peak days. 6. Evaluates and optimizes transportation portfolio considering alternative transportation options upstream pipeline capacity and market changes that could affect the portfolio. 7. Responsible for working with engineers and operations to evaluate local production opportunities. ', "Qualified candidates will have the following:  -Bachelor's degree in mathematics or related field and 4-5 years of related experience or equivalent. -Solid experience with Tableau, statistical analysis and forecasting required. ", '-The following are additional preferred criteria: SQL, MS Azure, Python, PowerBI, or other visualization software.', 'This is a direct-hire, not C2C or contract role. Candidates must be US citizens or Permanent Residents and able to permanently relocate to New Orleans in the near future.']

job_title: Data Analyst Supporting the US Attorney's Office
job_text: ['', 'Coordinates requests for additional information as needed.', 'Performs other duties as assigned.', ' Receives, gathers, analyzes, and organizes information from multiple sources. Ensures completeness of received information and reconciles inconsistencies. Accurately enters required data into one or more databases, documents, or spreadsheets. Establishes and maintains physical files. Keeps track of case file status in order to ensure compliance with established deadlines. Coordinates requests for additional information as needed. Selects relevant information from a variety of sources in order to prepare documents, reports, summaries, and replies to inquiries, ensuring accuracy and proper format of the information provided. Performs word processing relevant to case. Provides accurate and timely status updates. Performs other duties as assigned. job_title: Pre-Trip Notification System (PTNS) & Electronic Monitoring (EM) Data Analyst
job_text: ['', 'Lead analyst to determine program functionality, risks, and overall effectiveness.', 'Working with diverse interagency teams', 'Lynker is an E-Verify employer.', 'Candidates without NEFOP observing or editing experience may be required to attend the first available observer training session', 'Proficient in current MS Office software programs.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills', 'Review/edit raw data logs for completeness and accuracy, contact observers and/or ASMs to verify inconsistencies, and solve data recording problems as needed.', 'Lynker offers a team-oriented work environment, competitive salaries and benefits, and the opportunity to work in a culture of exceptionally skilled and diverse professionals who embrace sound science and creative solutions.', 'Must be available for periodic overtime as well as regular weekend assignments.', 'About Lynker', 'Respond to industry, provider, and internal questions and inquiries in a professional manner.', 'Lynker Technologies, LLC is seeking to hire a Pre-Trip Notification System (PTNS) & Electronic Monitoring (EM) Data Analyst to support the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS) Northeast Fisheries Science Center (NEFSC) Fishery Sampling Branch (FSB) at the NOAA Facility in Tech Park East, Falmouth, MA. ', 'Assist with routine database maintenance tasks.', 'Degree in Marine Biology, Fisheries, Sciences or a related field.', 'Additional preferred skills include web development, SAS programming, ORACLE database knowledge, and SQL', "The FSB provides the Northeast Fisheries Observer Program (NEFOP) observer coverage and ASM coverage of several Northeast and Mid-Atlantic Federal and state fisheries through the NEFOP and the At-Sea Monitoring (ASM) program. FSB staff trains and monitors the performance of NEFOP observers and ASMs, who complete data collection and biological sampling on board commercial fishing vessels from Maine to North Carolina, USA. Selection of vessels and deployment of observers and ASMs varies by fishery. In the Northeast multispecies groundfish fishery and the longfin squid fishery, selection is managed by the PTNS. The PTNS is a web-based system used by all groundfish sector vessels and select non-sector vessels. They  are required to provide 48 hours' notice prior to each PTNS-eligible fishing trip. Notifications are made by vessel representatives via direct use of the PTNS website, phone calls, or emails, 24 hours per day, 7 days per week. FSB staff provides live support for the PTNS Monday through Friday during office hours and intermittent support outside of office hours - nights, weekends, and holidays as needed. An after-hours answering service Contractor provides PTNS telephone support nightly, and on weekends and holidays. In order to provide PTNS support to the groundfish and longfin squid industries and to NEFOP and ASM providers, FSB staff must answer phone calls and respond to inquiries in a polite and courteous manner. Additionally, regular database maintenance tasks must be performed to ensure accuracy of trip counts, compliance monitoring and observer coverage metrics. Sector, vessel, and provider-specific PTNS data summaries, as well as system analyses are required on a regular basis. ", 'Edit NEFOP observer and/or ASM data and become familiar with protocols for all observed fisheries.', 'Assist with PTNS and EM outreach as requested.', 'Assist with monitoring PTNS website and system performance, and with monitoring vessel coverage metrics.', 'Lynker Technologies is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and encourages women, minorities, individuals with disabilities and veterans to apply.', 'The position includes the following tasks:', 'Lynker Technologies', 'Program planning and management in a team environment', 'Assist with querying PTNS, OBDBS, and EM and other commercial fishing databases as needed.', 'Developing and monitoring resource investment strategies', 'Must be willing and available to provide PTNS support after-hours on nights, weekends and holidays (this work is generally minimal and can be performed from home)', 'Minimum required qualifications include:', "Assist with monitoring vessels' PTNS compliance.", 'Previous or current NEFOP observer or ASM experience', "We focus on putting the right people in the right place to be effective. ', 'We are seeking an exceptional researcher to join our team as a Principal Scientist. You will design and evaluate candidate therapies for the treatment of cancer and autoimmune diseases. The ideal candidate is an immunologist with molecular and/or cellular training with experience in using gain-of-function techniques (transgenes, gene therapy, gene editing) to engineer immune cells to create therapeutic candidates. Evaluation oRNA constructs and formulations in in-house animal models As needed, lead collaborations with extramural groups (CROs or academics) to design and execute evaluation of candidate oRNA formulations in established animal models.Actively participate within project teams and collaborate across interdisciplinary R&D programs.Independently design rigorous experiments, interpret data, and communicate findings in well-articulated presentations.Contribute to a positive and exciting work environment, contributing to a\xa0strong, entrepreneurial and creative culture.', 'Animal models of cancer and autoimmune diseaseNew modality therapies, such as RNA, gene therapy or gene editingProtein and nucleic acid manipulation', 'Molecular mechanisms of immuno-oncology and/or autoimmunityEngineering immune cell effector or regulatory function (ideally both)Animal models of cancer and autoimmune diseaseNew modality therapies, such as RNA, gene therapy or gene editingProtein and nucleic acid manipulation']

job_title: Executive Director, RWE & Data Science (US Remote)
job_text: ['', 'Minimum Requirements', ' >3 years people management experience. Proven track record of leading teams.', ' Substantial experience engaging/partnering with external organizations (e.g., SOCs/IDNs, payers, universities, professional organizations, etc.) involving patient-level data sharing is strongly preferred.', 'Country', 'Work Location', ' 10 years’ experience in healthcare sector, preferably in RWE, epidemiology, health economics, digital solutions, population health or related functions/fields is required.', 'Division', 'Business Unit', 'Company/Legal Entity', ' Expert knowledge of RWE, epidemiology, health economics, outcomes research, advanced analytics including study design, methodologies, data sources and analyses is required.', ' Fluent English – Oral and written', ' Experience with deidentifying and aggregating electronic patient-level data (e.g., EHR) from multiple organizations is strongly preferred.', 'Job Description', 'Functional Area', 'Employment Type', ' Understanding of US healthcare financing and delivery system, evolving trends around payers/SOCs/health policy is preferred.', ' Expert knowledge of RWE, epidemiology, health economics, outcomes research, advanced analytics including study design, methodologies, data sources and analyses is required. In-depth knowledge in and working experience with major Electronic Health Record systems and component data fields is strongly preferred. Understanding of US healthcare financing and delivery system, evolving trends around payers/SOCs/health policy is preferred.', ' An advanced degree (masters or doctorate) in statistics, data science, epidemiology, observational research, public/population health or related field is required.', ' In-depth knowledge in and working experience with major Electronic Health Record systems and component data fields is strongly preferred.', 'The Novartis Group of Companies are Equal Opportunity Employers and take pride in maintaining a diverse environment. We do not discriminate in recruitment, hiring, training, promotion or any other employment practices for reasons of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, sexual orientation, marital or veteran status, disability, or any other legally protected status.', 'Job Type', ' In addition, MD, PharmD or similar clinical degree is preferred.', 'Shift Work', 'EEO Statement', ' An advanced degree (masters or doctorate) in statistics, data science, epidemiology, observational research, public/population health or related field is required. In addition, MD, PharmD or similar clinical degree is preferred. Fluent English – Oral and written 10 years’ experience in healthcare sector, preferably in RWE, epidemiology, health economics, digital solutions, population health or related functions/fields is required. >3 years people management experience. Proven track record of leading teams. Substantial experience engaging/partnering with external organizations (e.g., SOCs/IDNs, payers, universities, professional organizations, etc.) involving patient-level data sharing is strongly preferred. Experience with deidentifying and aggregating electronic patient-level data (e.g., EHR) from multiple organizations is strongly preferred.']

job_title: BS/MS Chemist, Associate Scientist in Procter & Gamble Corporate Functions Analytical
job_text: ['', 'The candidate will first learn to lead our laboratory operations, assuring readiness of instrumentation by handling maintenance, documentation, purchasing, and organization.', 'Description', ' Experience with Office products – especially Word and Excel ', ' Eager to learn and curious about technology ', ' Familiarity with P&G products ', ' Lab-based research experience, including use of Analytical measurement instrumentation ', ' Experience with MatLab', ' The successful candidate will become a member of the CFA Vibrational Spectroscopy (VS) team, partnering with a Principle Scientist and two Senior Scientists who are all experts in infrared and Raman spectroscopy. The candidate will first learn to lead our laboratory operations, assuring readiness of instrumentation by handling maintenance, documentation, purchasing, and organization. The individual will need to quickly become proficient and continuously gain expertise in experimental design, use of VS instruments, sample handling, and data processing (training provided). After successfully engaging in training and expertise-building, our new team member will assume responsibility for collaborating with all our product business partners as the go-to VS resource for immediate trouble shooting, plant issue reconciliation, foreign particle identification, and the like. The VS team will be strongly engaged and supportive to provide additional technical expertise and coaching as needed to ensure success. ', ' BS or MS in Chemistry; minor or having interest in mathematics is a plus  Lab-based research experience, including use of Analytical measurement instrumentation  Demonstrated problem-solving skills in a lab setting  Demonstrated oral and written communication skills  Eager to learn and curious about technology  Successfully demonstrated completion of short- and long-term projects; prioritization skills  Experience with Office products – especially Word and Excel ', 'The individual will need to quickly become proficient and continuously gain expertise in experimental design, use of VS instruments, sample handling, and data processing (training provided).', 'Qualifications', 'After successfully engaging in training and expertise-building, our new team member will assume responsibility for collaborating with all our product business partners as the go-to VS resource for immediate trouble shooting, plant issue reconciliation, foreign particle identification, and the like. ['', 'Ability to apply the principles of independent logical thinking to define problems, collect data, establish facts, draw valid conclusions and make actionable strategic recommendations.', 'We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. Diversity is valued and we will not tolerate discrimination or harassment in any form. Candidates for the position stated above are hired on an "at will" basis. Nothing herein is intended to create a contract.', 'Develops custom, explainable models that enhance business processes to reflect corporate goals, experience, and current market conditions using pattern recognition, evolutionary computation, and machine learning algorithms.', 'Knowledge of insurance and underwriting techniques, agency and policyholder needs.', 'Ability to serve as a mentor to others.', 'Ability to maintain confidentiality.', 'Conducts research utilizing predictive modeling.', 'Presents findings and recommendations to appropriate groups.', 'Ability and proficiency in the use of computers and company standard software specific to position. General familiarity with the following software: SAS, R, SQL.', 'Skills/Knowledge/Abilities (ska) Required', 'Ability to comprehend consequences of various situations and make appropriate individuals aware of same for decision making.', 'Delivers conclusions.', ' Excellent interpersonal, organizational and communication skills. Ability and proficiency in the use of computers and company standard software specific to position. General familiarity with the following software: SAS, R, SQL. Strong database management skills. Ability to provide direction to other department analysts. Ability to use independent judgment and initiative and to anticipate needs of executive and department, accomplishing tasks without direction. Ability to work effectively as a member of a team. Resourceful problem solving skills and desire to succeed. Knowledge of insurance and underwriting techniques, agency and policyholder needs. Ability to establish workflows, manages multiple projects, meet necessary deadlines, and work without supervision. Exercise sufficient discretion and independent judgment with a wide degree of creativity and latitude. Ability to apply the principles of independent logical thinking to define problems, collect data, establish facts, draw valid conclusions and make actionable strategic recommendations. Ability to manage responsibilities as unexpected pressures/dilemmas arise. Ability to comprehend consequences of various situations and make appropriate individuals aware of same for decision making. Ability to maintain confidentiality. Expert knowledge of statistical modeling and data mining techniques. Expert knowledge of modeling software and data manipulation techniques. Ability to lead a project team in the full scope of project assignments. Ability to serve as a mentor to others. ', 'Participates in and is responsible for projects requiring advanced statistical analyses, innovative research, mathematical calculations, and technical skills.', ' Provides technical and quantitative analysis for predictive modeling group. Assists in statistical data mining and actuarial research by applying advanced statistical concepts. Uses computer technology, computer modeling, spreadsheet applications, software tools, and programming languages. Participates in and is responsible for projects requiring advanced statistical analyses, innovative research, mathematical calculations, and technical skills. Conducts research utilizing predictive modeling. Interprets data and identifies correlations using both univariate and multivariate analysis. Participates in and is responsible for advanced projects. Presents findings and recommendations to appropriate groups. Prepares and delivers summary reports to the relevant or affected areas within the company. Helps to determine what actionable steps can be taken based on the findings. Communicates and trains users on model results. Develops custom, explainable models that enhance business processes to reflect corporate goals, experience, and current market conditions using pattern recognition, evolutionary computation, and machine learning algorithms. Document model requirements. Examine and analyze data to determine optimal modeling approach. Identify candidate risk factors. Build models using training, test, and cross-validation data sets. Share model results. Finalize model. Delivers conclusions. Deploy and maintain models with or without the assistance of the IT department. Leads communication of predictive model results to company. Leads implementation efforts for assigned predictive model projects. Trains predictive modelers I and II in predictive modeling and other analytical tasks. Performs ad hoc analysis to identify issues with existing models. Designs and leads implementation efforts for the maintenance procedures for our models. job_title: Post Doctorate RA - Visual Analytics Research Associate
job_text: ['', 'In-depth knowledge in areas such as text analysis, network analysis & visualization, data science, machine learning, and optimization is highly desirable.', 'Selects and develops technical approaches on assignments with occasional oversight.', 'Skilled professional who applies a broad basis of existing theories, principles, and concepts to a specialty field.', ' Preferred academic coursework the disciplines of computer science, human computer interaction, visual analytics, human factors engineering, or related disciplines. ', ' Please be aware that the Department of Energy (DOE) prohibits DOE employees and contractors from participation in certain foreign government talent recruitment programs. If you are offered a position at PNNL and are currently a participant in a foreign government talent recruitment program you will be required to disclose this information before your first day of employment. ', 'Beginning to establish a leadership role in professional community including professional societies, other laboratories, academia, and industry.', ' Skilled professional who applies a broad basis of existing theories, principles, and concepts to a specialty field. Technical expert who selects and widely applies principles, theories and concepts in a major field of specialization. In-depth knowledge in areas such as text analysis, network analysis & visualization, data science, machine learning, and optimization is highly desirable. Experience with user experience design and evaluation methodologies (e.g, design of experiments, empirical studies, qualitative studies, statistical analysis). ', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', 'Organization and Job ID', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Job Description', ' Establishing a local reputation with specialization in at least one S&E domain. Selects and develops technical approaches on assignments with occasional oversight. Beginning to establish a leadership role in professional community including professional societies, other laboratories, academia, and industry. ', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience with user experience design and evaluation methodologies (e.g, design of experiments, empirical studies, qualitative studies, statistical analysis).', 'Preferred academic coursework the disciplines of computer science, human computer interaction, visual analytics, human factors engineering, or related disciplines.', 'Establishing a local reputation with specialization in at least one S&E domain.', 'Preferred Education', 'Technical expert who selects and widely applies principles, theories and concepts in a major field of specialization.']

['', 'As a\xa0Senior Data Analyst, you will:', 'Experience with statistical models and machine learning or with working closely with Data Scientists a plus', 'We are looking for a sharp, highly-motivated Senior Data Analyst to join our team. If you have a natural curiosity, the technical skill to apply that curiosity in investigating large data sets, and an ability to tell a story with data and visualization, we want to hear from you! This is a high-impact role that will bridge the gap between the business and data by collaborating with our executive stakeholders and our external partners to derive insights from our data and drive improvements to the business. In addition to helping the company make data-driven decisions to improve operations, your work will be used in newspaper and magazine articles and in discussions with policymakers.\xa0This will require a solid understanding of the company’s strategic and operational goals as well as a customer-first mindset and the ability to communicate at the executive level.', 'Comfortable working cross-functionally with different parts of the organization and with distributed teams across multiple offices and timezones', 'Responsibilities', 'Statement to ALL Third-Party Agencies and Similar Organizations: Steady accepts resumes only from agencies with which we formally engage their services. Please do not forward resumes to our applicant tracking system, Steady employees, Steady hiring manager, or send to any Steady facility. Steady is not responsible for any fees or charges associated with unsolicited resumes.', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial, high-energy environment with shifting priorities', 'Work with our bank transaction and customer event data to develop insights about the nature of employment and earnings for our Members.', 'Steady, Platform Inc. (Steady) is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer – All qualified applicants/employees will receive consideration for employment without regard to that individual’s age, race, color, religion or creed, national origin or ancestry, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, physical or mental disability, veteran status, genetic information, ethnicity, citizenship, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Familiarity and experience with the AWS data ecosystem (S3, AWS Glue, EMR, etc.)', 'For more information, visit us at\xa0', 'Demonstrated experience of efficient manipulation and storage of large datasets', 'Any US location (offices in Atlanta, GA and Playa Vista, CA)', 'Location/City:\xa0Any US location (offices in Atlanta, GA and Playa Vista, CA)', 'For more information, visit us at\xa0www.steadyapp.com\xa0or on Twitter @TheSteadyApp.\xa0', 'Minimum of 3 years experience (5-7 years preferred) performing exploratory data analysis to understand the characteristics of a data set and identify patterns.\xa0', 'Experience with bank or credit card transaction data preferred', '\ufeffAbout Steady', 'Steady is a mission-driven business that helps people earn more. Through the free Steady app users can build & track income, networks, and buying power – allowing them to augment retirement savings, work around childcare responsibilities, pay down debt, save for purchases, and supplement their income from primary employers, while limiting their income volatility and better positioning themselves for access to a sustainable financial services ecosystem.', 'Outstanding verbal and written communication skills with the ability to interact at all levels of the organization as well as with external stakeholders', 'Senior Data Analyst', 'Help drive a data-first culture where data is understood and leveraged in decision making.', 'Surface data-driven insights that drive strategy and optimal decision making for the leaders across the organization.', 'Strong data visualization skills (experience with Tableau preferred)', 'Automate relentlessly so your and others’ time can be spent on high-value analysis rather than running reports.', 'Work with our bank transaction and customer event data to develop insights about the nature of employment and earnings for our Members.Surface data-driven insights that drive strategy and optimal decision making for the leaders across the organization.Create visualizations and other reporting that distill complex data into actionable information for executives and external stakeholders.Help drive a data-first culture where data is understood and leveraged in decision making.Effectively balance competing priorities and deadlines, with an eye on both short term delivery with long term direction and value.Create testing and monitoring processes to ensure that our data is of the highest quality.Automate relentlessly so your and others’ time can be spent on high-value analysis rather than running reports.Collaborate with the data team and Chief Data Officer to define the technical strategy for Steady’s data ecosystem', 'Create visualizations and other reporting that distill complex data into actionable information for executives and external stakeholders.', 'Minimum of 3 years experience (5-7 years preferred) performing exploratory data analysis to understand the characteristics of a data set and identify patterns.\xa0Demonstrated experience of efficient manipulation and storage of large datasetsComfortable dealing with ambiguity, making assumptions, drawing conclusions and distilling complex analysis for non-technical audiencesOutstanding verbal and written communication skills with the ability to interact at all levels of the organization as well as with external stakeholdersHands on experience and expertise with SQL, Spark, Python (preferred) or RStrong data visualization skills (experience with Tableau preferred)Experience with data warehousing, preferably with Snowflake, and knowledge of ETL/ELT best practices.Familiarity and experience with the AWS data ecosystem (S3, AWS Glue, EMR, etc.)Experience with bank or credit card transaction data preferredExperience with statistical models and machine learning or with working closely with Data Scientists a plusComfortable working cross-functionally with different parts of the organization and with distributed teams across multiple offices and timezonesAbility to thrive in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial, high-energy environment with shifting priorities', 'Experience with data warehousing, preferably with Snowflake, and knowledge of ETL/ELT best practices.', 'Create testing and monitoring processes to ensure that our data is of the highest quality.', 'We value our Steady Team Members and are committed to their success. We are located in downtown Atlanta near MARTA, as well as in Playa Vista CA.\xa0We offer competitive compensation packages and a 100% company-paid benefits package including medical, dental, and vision. Steady is a relaxed, casual work environment with flexible hours and lunch provided once weekly in addition to a weekly meal stipend. We also offer a generous PTO plan, 401K, and future growth opportunities within the company. We strive to maintain a positive and fun environment for our employees where people can learn and grow with the company.\xa0', 'Benefits', 'Mission:\xa0Steady turns the tables by putting workers back in charge of their financial future with an income-building platform that\xa0creates financial stability and helps its users to take charge of their future.', 'Skills & Requirements', 'Every Steady member will build something different. We celebrate those who take the initiative to create a path that works for them. Whatever that looks like, Steady is there to support it, providing a stable foundation that allows people to build financial success over a lifetime.', 'Hands on experience and expertise with SQL, Spark, Python (preferred) or R', 'Comfortable dealing with ambiguity, making assumptions, drawing conclusions and distilling complex analysis for non-technical audiences', 'Effectively balance competing priorities and deadlines, with an eye on both short term delivery with long term direction and value.', 'Collaborate with the data team and Chief Data Officer to define the technical strategy for Steady’s data ecosystem']

', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. ['', 'About us ', 'Quantitative Researcher ', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at our firm. We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas. ', "Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success with visible contributions to the business ", 'Quantitative Researcher', 'About us', 'Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement.', 'Company events are inclusive and fun, with expeditions to food trucks and Michelin-starred local restaurants, and annual trips to Montana and Stinson Beach featuring hiking and cooking ', 'Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. ', 'You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. ', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement.', "Founded in by a Google software engineer and a quant trader, we are backed by some great investors, including Y Combinator and a famous Venture Capital firm. ', 'What you bring to the table', 'You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there.
